title: Elementary Mathematics Project-Based Education Utilizing Learning Objects and Design Reuse

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics concepts and basic digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Emphasizes learners' ability to solve math problems applicable in real-world settings, building collaborative knowledge-sharing environments through peer collaboration

learning_goals: Develop the competency to analyze learning objects and recycle them for math education projects with over 80% efficiency.
Improve existing instructional designs through a technology succession process in three or more stages.
Achieve over 90% effectiveness in applying learning objects via peer assessment in a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) environment.

resources: Digital Learning Object Library for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
